HomePage.heroDesc1: Gear up with premium sports equipment and apparel designed for performance.
HomePage.heroDesc2: Stay ahead with the latest gadgets and electronics at unbeatable prices.
HomePage.heroDesc3: Transform your living space with our curated home and lifestyle essentials.
HomePage.heroDesc4: Everything you need to keep your furry friends happy and healthy.
HomePage.saleSubtitle: Limited time offers. Grab them before they're gone!
HomePage.noDeals: New deals coming soon. Stay tuned!
HomePage.joinCircle: Join our premium inner circle and receive exclusive updates, early access to new collections, and a <gift>{giftValue}</gift> welcome gift.

Footer.tagline: Experience the future of online shopping. We bring you curated collections and premium quality products from around the globe.
Footer.subscribeDesc: Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.

AboutPage.title: Our Story
AboutPage.subtitle: Founded with a passion for quality and innovation, we've been delivering excellence since day one.
AboutPage.whoWeAreDesc: We are a team of dedicated professionals committed to providing the best shopping experience for our customers.
AboutPage.ourMissionDesc: To revolutionize the way people shop online by offering premium products at unbeatable prices.
AboutPage.integrityDesc: We believe in absolute transparency and ethical sourcing for every item in our inventory.
AboutPage.readyToShopSubtitle: Explore our curated collection of high-quality products today.

ContactPage.title: Let's Start a Conversation.
ContactPage.subtitle: Whether you have a specific question or just want to explore possibilities, our premium support team is ready to assist you.
ContactPage.receiveRequest: We've received your request and will reach out shortly.
